description: Verify the api-fix skill correctly parses scoring output, prioritizes, fixes, and re-scores.

tests.name: Accept Scoring Input
tests.prompt: Run api-fix with the scorecard as input
tests.setup: Provide an api-scoring scorecard with 6 issues across Security, Input Validation, Rate Limiting.
expectations: Run api-fix with the scorecard as input
Verify skill parses all 6 issues with correct severity and category
Verify skill identifies the weighted score and grade
tests.pass_criteria: All issues extracted. No issue lost or duplicated.

tests.name: Fix in Severity Order
tests.prompt: Run api-fix and observe fix application order
tests.setup: Scorecard contains CRITICAL (CSP unsafe-eval), HIGH (no per-user rate limiting), MEDIUM (missing error codes).
tests.pass_criteria: CSP fix applied first (CRITICAL), then rate limiting (HIGH, 10% weight), then error codes (MEDIUM). No MEDIUM fix applied before all HIGH items resolved.

tests.name: Fix References Correct Pattern
tests.prompt: Run api-fix and check which reference file the skill loads
expectations: Check which reference file the skill loads
tests.pass_criteria: Skill loads `references/fix-patterns/ratelimit-response-perf.md` and applies the "Per-User Rate Limiting" pattern. Fix code matches the pattern structure (userId parameter, key prefix).

tests.name: Verification Step Confirms Fix
tests.prompt: Run api-fix to apply the Content-Type Enforcement fix and verify compilation and tests
expectations: Run api-fix to apply the fix
Check that skill verifies: TypeScript compiles, existing tests pass, the specific criterion improves
tests.pass_criteria: Skill runs `pnpm tsc --noEmit` or equivalent. Reports verification result before moving to next fix.

tests.name: Re-Score Shows Improvement
tests.prompt: Run api-fix through full cycle and compare before/after scores
tests.setup: Initial score 62/100 (grade C+). Apply fixes for 3 CRITICAL + 2 HIGH issues.
tests.pass_criteria: Re-score produces a higher weighted score. Each fixed category shows improvement. Final grade is at least B. Report uses `assets/templates/fix-report.md.template` format.
